executives.name: Alex Tan Wei Ming
executives.description: Is a visionary leader responsible for the strategic direction and development of the company. With extensive experience in the animal pharmaceutical industry and exceptional leadership skills, Alex builds strategic partnerships with stakeholders and investors to ensure the company’s long-term growth.

executives.name: Grace Lim Jia Hui
executives.description: Oversees the company’s daily operations, including production, distribution, and process efficiency. With expertise in logistics and supply chain management, Grace ensures smooth operations while adhering to regulations, focusing on both efficiency and quality.

executives.name: Ryan Lee Yong Sheng
executives.description: Is a technology expert leading innovation in animal drug development. With an academic background in veterinary pharmacy and solid research experience, Ryan is responsible for implementing the latest technologies in production and R&D.

executives.name: Sophia Ng Xue Ting
executives.description: manages the company’s finances, focusing on sustainability and budget efficiency. With experience in handling financial operations for large companies, Sophia ensures financial stability through smart investment strategies and accurate risk analysis.

executives.name: Ethan Wong Zi Jie
executives.description: leads the company’s marketing and branding strategies, ensuring Oocidia’s products appeal to the market. With experience in pharmaceutical marketing and strong communication skills, Ethan builds robust relationships with veterinary communities and farmers to expand the company’s reach.
